param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Brake Margin
param.desc: Percentage of fin margin to use for braking

param.name: Entity Label - Servo Position
param.desc: Label of the servo position message to compute produced torque

param.name: Heading Rate Bypass
param.desc: Bypass heading rate controller and use reference directly on torques

param.name: Maximum Depth
param.desc: Maximum admissible depth that the vehicle may sustain

param.name: Heading Rate PID Gains
param.desc: PID gains for Heading Rate controller

param.name: Heading Rate Integral Limit
param.desc: Integral limit for Heading Rate controller

param.name: Maximum Pitch Actuation
param.desc: Maximum admissible fin actuation for the pitch controller

param.name: Maximum Pitch Reference
param.desc: Maximum pitch reference used by depth controller

param.name: Use Fixed Depth Offset
param.desc: Use a fixed depth offset to compensate for steady state error

param.name: Force Pitch At Surface
param.desc: Force pitching up at the surface

param.name: Pitch Angle At Surface
param.desc: Angle at which to force pitch at the surface

param.name: Use Fixed Roll Offset
param.desc: Use a fixed roll offset to compensate for steady state error

param.name: Heading Rate Open Loop
param.desc: Dispatch heading rate commands directly to servos

param.name: Error Attitude Compensation
param.desc: Compensate PID controller errors with vehicle's attitude

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Minimum DVL Depth
param.desc: Depth value below which altitude from DVL will be ignored

param.name: Minimum DVL Altitude
param.desc: Altitude value below which altitude from DVL will be ignored

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Pitch Reference
param.desc: Desired pitch while remotely operating the vehicle

param.name: Maximum Heading Rate
param.desc: Maximum admissible heading rate to be commanded

param.name: Position of Horizontal Fins
param.desc: Fixed position for the horizontal fins while remotely operating

param.name: EstimatedState Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for the estimated state in case navigation fails

param.name: Force Torque Control
param.desc: Force direct torque control instead of desired heading rate

param.name: Disable Analog Thrust
param.desc: Enable or disable analog thrust over fixed increments

param.name: Maximum Thruster Actuation
param.desc: Maximum admissible thruster actuation while remotely operating

param.name: Hardware RPMs Control
param.desc: Hardware control of the motor's rpms

param.name: RPMs at Maximum Thrust
param.desc: End of scale value for RPM's at 100% of thurst

param.name: Minimum RPM Limit
param.desc: Minimum value admissible for desired RPMs

param.name: Maximum RPM Acceleration
param.desc: Maximum acceleration step to smooth speed ramp in mps control

param.name: Ramp Actuation Limit
param.desc: Ramp actuation limit when the value is rising in actuation per second

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: Bottom Track -- Enabled
param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Altitude
param.desc: Minimum admissible altitude for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Altitude Tolerance
param.desc: Altitude tolerance below which altitude is ignored

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Tolerance
param.desc: Depth tolerance below which altitude is ignored

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Corridor -- Width
param.desc: Width of corridor for attack entry angle

param.name: Corridor -- Entry Angle
param.desc: Attack angle when lateral track error equals corridor width

param.name: Extended Control -- Turn Rate Gain
param.desc: Turn rate gain for extended control

param.name: Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: Cross Track Tolerance
param.desc: Tolerance in cross-track error to consider loiter has started

param.name: Number Of Turns
param.desc: Number of 360 degree turns until calibration

param.name: Depth Tolerance
param.desc: Depth tolerance when elevating towards a new depth

param.name: Radius Tolerance
param.desc: Distance tolerance to start loitering near elevator's location

param.name: Vertical Monitor -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Negative values will disable vertical progress monitor

param.name: Vertical Monitor -- Timeout
param.desc: Timeout when progress is below the specified value

param.name: Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Vehicle Type
param.desc: Vehicle type (AUV or UAV), default AUV

param.name: Horizontal Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (XY)

param.name: Vertical Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (Z)

param.name: Default Speed
param.desc: Speed to use in case no speed is given by reference source.

param.name: Default Speed Units
param.desc: Units to use for default speed (one of 'm/s', 'rpm' or '%').

param.name: Default Z
param.desc: Default z when no vertical reference is given.

param.name: Default Z Units
param.desc: Units to use for default z reference (one of 'DEPTH', 'ALTITUDE' or 'HEIGHT')

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of the loiter when waiting for new waypoint

param.name: Using RemoteState
param.desc: Using remote state for tracking system

param.name: Min Displace
param.desc: Minimum target displacement for computing new heading

param.name: Minimum Safe Distance
param.desc: Minimum safe distance to target system

param.name: Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Minimum Satellites
param.desc: Least number of satellites to accept fixes

param.name: Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance between gps_fix position and the estimated state

param.name: Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: MPS Control
param.desc: Enable or disable meter per second control

param.name: Max Speed MPS
param.desc: Maximum speed in meters per second

param.name: Min Speed MPS
param.desc: Minimum speed in meters per second

param.name: Max Step Actuation
param.desc: Maximum step in actuation per command

param.name: Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: Check Path Errors
param.desc: True if we should check path errors and stabilize pitch

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: CPU - Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth CPU usage

param.name: CPU - Maximum Usage
param.desc: Maximum CPU usage. When this value is hit an error will be raised

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: SMS Recipient Number
param.desc: Phone number of the SMS recipient

param.name: Expiration Time - Lost Communications
param.desc: Expiration time of lost communications SMS

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring
param.default: AHRS, Attitude, CPU, GPS, LBL, Navigation, Operational Limits, Path Control

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.default: Broom, Clock, Collisions, DVL, Sidescan, SCRT, Fuel
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Initial Setting - Maximum Vertical Rate
param.desc: Initial setting for maximum vertical rate

param.name: Minimum Depth to Check Altitude
param.desc: Minimum depth required to check altitude operational limits

param.name: Position Error Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for position error in fault detection

param.name: Position Rate Factor
param.desc: Factor in fault detection for comparison between accumulated differences

param.name: Position Error Delay
param.desc: Delay for the detection triggering using DelayedTrigger class

param.name: Position Error Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for the moving average in the DelayedTrigger object

param.name: Maximum Rotation Rate
param.desc: Maximum rotation rate allowed by the servo

param.name: Current Fault Detection
param.desc: Enable servo electric current fault detection

param.name: Current Lower Threshold
param.desc: Current lower threshold to consider abnormal behavior

param.name: Current Upper Threshold
param.desc: Current upper threshold to consider abnormal behavior

param.name: Maximum Lower Faults
param.desc: Number of faults above the lower threshold to consider a current fault detection

param.name: Maximum Upper Faults
param.desc: Number of faults above the upper threshold to consider a current fault detection

param.name: Fault Time Cooldown
param.desc: Period of time after which the fault vectors will be reset to zero

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Max. Horizontal Position Variance
param.desc: Maximum allowed horizontal Position estimation covariance

param.name: Reject all LBL ranges
param.desc: Boolean variable that defines if vehicle rejects all LblRanges

param.name: LBL Expected Range Rejection Constants
param.desc: Constants used in current LBL rejection scheme

param.name: Main Depth timeout
param.desc: No Depth readings from main provider timeout

param.name: Distance Between DVL and CG
param.desc: Distance between DVL and vehicle Center of Gravity

param.name: Distance Between GPS and CG
param.desc: Distance between GPS and vehicle Center of Gravity

param.name: Distance Between LBL and GPS
param.desc: Distance between LBL receiver and GPS in the vehicle

param.name: DVL relative threshold time window
param.desc: DVL relative threshold time window to be applied

param.name: LBL Threshold
param.desc: LBL Threshold value for the LBL level check rejection scheme

param.name: GPS Maximum HDOP
param.desc: Maximum Horizontal Dilution of Precision value accepted for GPS fixes

param.name: GPS Maximum HACC

param.desc: Maximum Horizontal Accuracy Estimate Moving Average factor

param.name: Heave Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth heave

param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth maximum GPS HACC.

param.desc: Entity label of the DVL device

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Standard Deviation
param.desc: Standard deviation of "good" range. It is assumed that range errors are Gaussian distributed with mean 0 and std. dev. sigma. Rule of thumb (the usual one): to achieve 95% of range errors with absolute value less than E, set sigma = E / 2. For 99% of errors lower than E set sigma = E / 3
